short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get search results faster - skip the step of going to the site where you want to search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Performing a search typically takes 4 steps:

1. Open the browser
2. Visit the website (ex. Amazon)
3. Enter search text
4. Click the Search button or hit Enter/Return

With this Chrome Extension, the search box is already on the page. Once you put in your criteria, simply click the logo where you want to search.

Use this extension to skip Step 2 above!
